results.content_html:
I recommented this course to any one who wants to learn about web animation.
She helped me and answered my questions about GSAP library even she helped me when i need to convert SVG. so it's good experience with this course.

results.content: This introduction gives one the idea that all kinds of animations are going to be explained. The process is relatively easy but this was not done. Instead only a picture of "roadrunner" was dissected from jgpeg to svg and then put in animation form. It was a good excercise but the course was inadequate for experiential purposes. Again, if the course had included the initial illustrations I would have to give it an A++. Since writing this course, the instructor has communicated with me and indicated that she has taken my suggestions to heart. It is with great expectations that I look forward to course additions and hope that the examples provided in the introduction are included. There simply isn't anything in the animation instructional field like it, and this course would be "head and shoulders" above any other animation course FOR SURE>

response.content: Thank you so much my good student and thank you for supporting this course and i'll expand it step by step to soon would become the most powerful Web Animation training course. I immediately help all students who interested in learning and encourage them to use this training in their web projects ;)
